import React, { useState } from 'react'; import NostraOverview from './nostraoverview'; function Project() { const [showNostraOverview, setShowNostraOverview] = useState(false); const handleClick = () => { setShowNostraOverview(true); }; const openNostraOverviewInNewTab = () => { window.open('/nostraoverview', '_blank'); }; return (

Skills Acquired

Bulkmail Project

Jan 2024

BulkMailify is a project focused on sending bulk emails efficiently and reliably, built using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack.

During the course of this project,

  • Developed BulkMailify using the MERN stack to handle both frontend and backend aspects
  • Implemented features such as dynamic email templates, recipient management, and real-time email tracking
  • Utilized MongoDB for database management, Express.js and Node.js for server-side logic, and React.js for building the user interface
  • Integrated with email APIs and utilized MERN stack's capabilities for efficient handling of bulk email sending

Actdo

Nov 2023

ToDo is a project aimed at managing tasks and to-do lists, featuring user authentication and CRUD operations.

During the course of this project,

  • Implemented user signup and login functionality using authentication mechanisms such as JWT (JSON Web Tokens) and bcrypt for password hashing
  • Developed CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations to manage tasks and to-do items
  • Enhanced user experience with features like multi-select filters, drag-and-drop task reordering, and real-time updates using WebSocket technology
  • Utilized MongoDB for database management, Express.js and Node.js for server-side logic, and React.js for building the user interface

Nostra Ecommerce Website

View Project

Dec 2023

Nostra Ecommerce is an online shopping platform catering to customers seeking a diverse range of products.

During the course of this project,

  • Developed 3 distinct web pages based on Wireframe layouts using HTML and CSS
  • Implemented Tailwind extensively for ensuring responsive design
  •  Deployed the website to Github/Netlify
